help.entry:
GET TAKE
"Get" and "take" are exactly the same and can be used interchangeably.
Usage: get | take <object> get | take all [object] get | take all all.<object> get | take all.<object> all.<object>
If you find something interesting on the ground, you may use 'get' to pick it up. 'get' can also be used to extract items from containers.
Examples:
> get sword corpse > get all corpse > get all all.bag > get all.bread all.bag
See also: DROP, PUT
